original_text: and a woman was there who had been crippled by a spirit for eighteen years. She was bent over and could not straighten up at all.
korean_text: 열여덟 해 동안이나 귀신 들려 앓으며 꼬부라져 조금도 펴지 못하는 한 여자가 있더라

sentences.original_text: who had been crippled by a spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 한 영에 의해 앉은뱅이가 되었었고

sentences.original_text: and could not straighten up at all
